title: 447: Gabby & Rachel’s Bachelorette Recap: FINALE PART 1
itunes:title: 447: Gabby & Rachel’s Bachelorette Recap: FINALE PART 1
description:
Bekah is out of town but The Broads managed a set up to make sure they could recap this Finale Part 1 episode of The Bachelorette(s) season! They chat about the men meeting the families, the shocking breakups, the obvious-ness of the Finale part 2 endings, and more!
